header.title: Dive into the heart of Belforce, an event where history and art intertwine harmoniously!
header.subtitle: Join the Belforce Festival: April 9-25, 2025

welcome.message3: in a new way with the
welcome.message5: Festival, the must-attend event to celebrate
welcome.message10: From the UNESCO World Heritage-listed Citadel to the vibrant murals, let us guide you through unforgettable

programme.presentation-programme: During your visit, indulge in a culinary adventure where each address tells a story. From the exotic flavors of Tajmahal to the traditional delights of Relais des Forges, and the surprising creations of Pochon Magique, there's something for everyone.
programme.presentation-programme2: Explore Belfort's rich heritage with the Marché Fréry, the mysterious Cravanche Cave, the impressive Citadel, and the unmissable Lion of Belfort. These iconic sites offer a unique journey through time.
programme.presentation-programme3: Between climbing, mountain biking, orienteering and archery, the Territoire de Belfort offers a multitude of sporting activities for all adventurers.
programme.presentation-programme4: From the jazz of the 22 St. Quartet to spectacular shows by Imagine Dragons and Eminem, to local talent like What's up Doc, let yourself be swept away by an eclectic and unforgettable musical program.

footer.abonner: Subscribe to our newsletter to never miss an event!
